title: Blind Starts A Recruiting Division To Match Tech Talent With Top Companies - Forbes
content: Blind Starts A Recruiting Division To Match Tech Talent With Top Companies  Forbes
description: To help companies procure hard-to-find, skilled software professionals, Blind, the leading anonymous professional social network, plans to connect its more than 5 million users on the site with some of the fastest-growing startups and most creative companies in the U.S.
